Companion: I'm really enjoying my photography lately. $q 600/601 haleyCompanion_followup#Hey @! Wanna help me with some photography around town today?#$r 600 10 haleyCompanion_yes#Sure! Make sure to take some good ones of me.#$r 601 -5 haleyCompanion_no#Not today. Sorry Haley.
haleyCompanion_yes: I didn't know it was possible to get a bad one of you.
haleyCompanion_no: *Sigh* Alright... Promise me next time then.
haleyCompanion_followup: #p 600 #Hey hold that pose! And that cute smile too!$h|I'll have some really nice locations picked out next time so promise you'll say 'yes'.
CompanionActions: Hey @, what's up? #$q 500/501 CompanionFollowup#What's up?#$r 500 0 CompanionActionEnd#That's all the time I have to hang out today.#$r 501 0 CompanionActionContinue#Nothing, just taking a breather.
CompanionActionEnd: Alright, well thanks for hanging out with me today!$h
